Katikati and Waihī Beach Community Business Awards: Finalists announced for people’s choice categories https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/katikati-advertiser/katikati-and-waihi-beach-community-business-awards-finalists-announced-for-peoples-choice-categories/ 5EHGF24FVBHT5GX7DMDJWWR6BE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/katikati-advertiser/katikati-and-waihi-beach-community-business-awards-finalists-announced-for-peoples-choice-categories/ 5EHGF24FVBHT5GX7DMDJWWR6BE/ Organisers name the finalists for each category. From Kaitāia to the world - Mea Motu chasing two boxing world titles https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/from-kaitaia-to-the-world-mea-motu-chasing-two-boxing-world-titles/2KQXTYMVOFBKFN2PMR5AP3VC6U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/from-kaitaia-to-the-world-mea-motu-chasing-two-boxing-world-titles/2KQXTYMVOFBKFN2PMR5AP3VC6U/ Mike DinsdaleThe Far North world champ has title unification bout in UK. Tauranga, Morrinsville boating businesses Sportcraft Marine and Sportcraft Boats in liquidation https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/tauranga-morrinsville-boating-businesses-sportcraft-marine-and-sportcraft-boats-in-liquidation/5CH2J7W3NZCMJB4DSWSQULQCQA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/tauranga-morrinsville-boating-businesses-sportcraft-marine-and-sportcraft-boats-in-liquidation/5CH2J7W3NZCMJB4DSWSQULQCQA/ Sandra ConchieThe businesses owe unpaid taxes and loans, according to the IRD's statements of claim. Wed, 04 Sep 2024 20:45:18 +0000 Sportcraft Marine Ltd and Sportcraft Boats Ltd have both been placed into liquidation after IRD applied to the High Courts at Tauranga and Hamilton on August 12, 2024. Photo / Sandra Conchie
